# Decennial population by State

```{r}
pop_2020 <- get_decennial(
    geography = "state",
    variable = "P1_001N",
    year = 2020)
```

```{r}
pop_2010 <- get_decennial(
  geography = "state", 
  variables = "P001001",
  year = 2010)
```
